title: Terror on the Hell Loop 2000
description: Chris wakes up, kisses Daryl Hannah, does his paper route, drags his neighbor to an amusement park and gets stuck on a roller coaster.

title: The Prettiest Week of My Life
description: Chris decides to enter the exciting world of male modeling when he joins the Handsome Boy School of Modeling.

title: Dadicus
description: Chris convinces his father to accompany him to the father-son competition at the annual paper boy picnic.

title: A Family Affair
description: When Sharon's sister pays a visit, she, surprisingly, finds Chris to be charming.

title: Pile of Death
description: To save his childhood park, Chris raises money by trying to break the world record for having things piled on you.

title: Paperboy 2000
description: The newspaper fires Chris and the rest of the delivery boys and replaces them with a robot, so Chris challenges the machine to a contest.

title: Drivers License
description: Chris asks out a waitress but first has to get a driver's license.

title: The Sitting
description: The home in which Chris is house sitting appears to haunted.

title: Bored Straight
description: Chris takes a group of young punks under his wing to make them better citizens.

title: Zoo Animals on Wheels
description: Chris auditions and gets the lead in a musical based on animals that wear roller skates - much to the chagrin of his nemesis, Sharon.

title: Roots
description: Chris finds evidence that he was adopted and goes in search of his birth parents.

title: The Counterfeit Watch Story
description: Chris buys a counterfeit watch from a disreputable vendor who won't refund his purchase price.

title: Chris vs. Donald
description: At the family reunion Chris is still struggling to get out from under the shadow of his cousin Donald.

title: Chris Wins a Celebrity
description: Chris wins a weekend with his favorite talk show host, a contest the host first regrets he agreed to, but later Chris regrets he entered, when the host decides to stay.

title: Houseboy 2000
description: After destroying her kitchen, Chris becomes Sharon's slave to work off the $2000 in damage and she also brainwashes him to break his will.

title: Married
description: During one day, Chris meets his soul mate, marries her and goes through an entire relationship with her.

title: Camping 2000
description: Chris and Larry join Mr. Peterson on a camping trip. When Mr. Peterson manages to lose them, the hungry boys eat some berries that cause them to hallucinate and become paranoid.

title: The Construction Worker Show
description: Chris hangs out with the construction workers who are working on his parents house.

title: The Big City
description: Chris' wallet is stolen in The Big City, and the Big City gives him the key to the city and other perks to make him feel better.

title: Neptune 2000
description: 20 years after mail ordering Chris receives the submarine kit "Neptune 2000". After putting it together with the aid of his father, they embark on the sub's maiden voyage inside Chris' bathtub.

title: Chris and Larry Switch Lives
description: Chris and Larry ignore an Indian curse and wind up switching lives. This way Chris realizes how pathetic and submissive is Larry's life.

title: Psychic 2000
description: After a near-death experience from choking on cereal, Chris gains psychic abilities. He then tries to prevent one of the predictions when he sees a vision of somebody trying to murder Sharon.

title: Chris Moves Out
description: When Chris hits the age of 31, he believes it's time for him to grow up and move out. So he moves in with retired cop Gus, but soon has doubts about his new home.

title: Meat Locker 2000
description: Sharon makes Chris pretend to be her boyfriend to impress her snooty friends but things go awry when the two of them get locked in her walk-in meat freezer.

title: Health Inspector 2000
description: Chris gets a job as a health inspector after finding a dead rat in his carton of milk.

title: Chris Becomes a Male Escort
description: Chris decides to become a male escort to meet woman but winds up with a much older woman.

title: Girlfriend 2000
description: Chris falls in love with a woman who hit him with her car and starts stalking her.

title: Chris' Brain Starts Working
description: Chris becomes intelligent after exposure to toxic waste, so Gus enters him in spelling bees across the world.

title: Bad Fish
description: Gus and Sharon get amnesia after eating rancid shellfish and Chris convinces them they are all three best friends.

title: SPEWEY and Me
description: When an alien creature crashes in Gus' front yard, Chris tries to keep it from the Government, but this alien is nothing like E.T. or ALF as its only superpower is the ability to spew and spray body fluids all over the place.
The sad story of Gus's dismissal from the police force fifteen years ago inspires Chris to travel back through time and attempt to set things right.

title: Clip Show
description: Chris falls out of an airplane while trying to find the bathroom and the last "year and a half ago" flashes before his eyes.
